{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.2M in 2021-2022** on contracts with IMTECH MARINE CANADA.

Across 66 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 8 have at least one amendment (12%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 29% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$461.0K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.4 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$179.8K. The longest contract was 1.64 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [IMTECH MARINE CANADA INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22IMTECH%20MARINE%20CANADA%20INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
